concept.title: Introduction to Logic Gates
concept.shortdesc: Logic gates are electronic circuits. They are fundamental components of all digital circuits and systems.

conbody.p: Logic gates use Boolean algebra (binary variables 0 and 1) to perform several logical operations. They take two or more input values but produce only one output. The output depends upon the combination of the input values and the logical operation performed by that logic gate.
There are seven primary logic gates.These are classified as follows:

ol.li:
Basic Logic Gates:
AND Gate
OR Gate
NOT Gate

Universal Logic Gates:
NAND Gate
NOR Gate

Derived Logic Gates:
XOR Gate
XNOR Gate

conbody.note: The most common components used in logic gates are diodes, transistors, resistors, and capacitors.
